subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Scamp, [1 Attachment]
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I get our last dogs from time to time, and used to get them via white
noise when I first started this. Last summer some kids came down into the
basement wiht the younger grandson, and the little yorkie barked, but "get
outta here" came out, some how.

 Yeah, I think I was too hard on RJ. I don't know why, but testing doens't
seem to work, but we get enough to prove this to ourselves. It's probably a
faith thing, although I'm not religious, even anti-religion.

 F-S



On Fri, Aug 20, 2010 at 6:27 PM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>  [Attachment(s)<https://mail.google.com/mail/?ui=2&view=js&name=main,tlist&ver=9oD1J7yvz5o.en.&am=!xONyw1plirqxhZ4a1PIWg1xlTveuJ8oWIzqJ6mz0Dt83ht4Zrp4&fri#12a920b21a6295da_TopText>from
> SnowfireL@aol.com included below]
>
> Here is a short file, where someone says, "Scamp, Scamp," then Scamp barks.
> "yap."  This little dog belonged to my grandma, when I was about 9 or 10
> years old, he was a Manchester Terrier, and lived with us for many years,
> and this is his bark for sure.  I'd know that bark anywhere.  Sorry, that I
> can't make it any clearer, I need to get one of those better ghost boxes I
> guess.  RJ, spirits are just like us, they are not omnipresent like
> God,  probably why David doesn't want to play the guessing game, he has
> better things to do over there, and has said, they have thousands of people
> standing in this long line waiting to get into the Heavens, and He can't
> just drop His job and go to your house to see what you have over there, He
> did tell me that first time what it was, and i sent it to you, but it was
> too late.  It's hard for me to understand them sometimes, He was also right
> about that little boy, Syler being killed, and where his body would be
> found, I don't know what they did about it though. sf
>
> 
>

I ge ou las dogs om ime o ime, and used o ge hem ia whi e noise when I i s s a ed his. Las summe some kids came down in o he basemen wih he younge g andson, and he li le yo kie ba ked, bu "ge ou a he e" came ou , some how. 

 
 Yeah, I hink I was oo ha d on RJ. I don' know why, bu es ing doens' seem o wo k, bu we ge enough o p o e his o ou sel es. I 's p obably a ai h hing, al hough I'm no eligious, e en an i- eligion.  

 
 F-S
